amendment.description: An amendment numbered 335 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to increase and decrease funding for the Federal-State Partnership for State of Good Repair program by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 335 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to increase and decrease funding for the Federal-State Partnership for State of Good Repair program by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sherrill amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A015) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sherrill amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Sherrill amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Ms. Sherrill.
